page.title: 19Susan's Lifestyle.
page.content: I am usually awake before my electronic alarm shrills in my ear. After a quick wash I dress myself in my needlecord culottes and a tee shirt. Downstairs I make my{packed {lunch,}crisps,peanut butter sandwiches lemon yoghurt and a can of Coca cola. Mum gives me my breakfast,usually Shreddies and milk,toast and marmalade I go to{primary school}by car ,school starts at 9.oo a.m We have assembly first, then lessons.After{playtime}we did project.After lunch we say grace and play outside until 1.15 pm.Today we go swimming,then it's library time until we go home.I watch"Blue Peter"and then I go to Brownies.When I come home I feed my cat and dog.At about 8.00 pm. I go to bed,making sure that my Teddy bears are safely tucked up beside me.
